title: [Ta'Illistim, Gateyard]
description: The gateyard begins to narrow as it funnels its occupants towards the northeast.  The stone walls close in a bit, flaming iron-sconced torches spaced evenly along the stoneworks just above reach for even the tallest giantman.  Two guardsmen stand atop a wooden platform, inspecting the hubbub of the gateyard.

The gateyard begins to narrow as it funnels its occupants towards the northeast.  The stone walls close in a bit, unlit iron-sconced torches spaced evenly along the stoneworks just above reach for even the tallest giantman.  Two guardsmen stand atop a wooden platform, inspecting the hubbub of the gateyard.
The gateyard's high ceiling lowers here, closer to the city proper.  The stone walls close in a bit, silver lanterns spaced evenly around the circular chamber glowing with a bright blue light.
The gateyard's high ceiling lowers here, closer to the city proper.  The stone walls close in a bit, silver lanterns spaced evenly around the circular chamber glowing with a dim blue light.
